name: Pinky
description:
I'm sorry if I wrote something wrong. My English is bad. This game tells the story of the adventures of a small slime from a famous game. The next time you kill Pinky in the Terraria, think about what path he had to go through.

Control:

A and D - moving

Space - jump

LMB - spit item

Enter - flip over hint

Mouse wheel - flipping levels

For music thanks to people with nicknames "a" and "Keitatthar".
